content: Michalis K. Titsias Athens University of Economics and Business mtitsias at aueb dot gr Home Teaching Talks Software Publications GitHub This page is not updated anymore. Here is my new page. I work as a full time Research Scientist at DeepMind based on London, UK. I am interested in the theory and applications of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Bayesian Statistics and Data Science. My CV (not recently updated) can be found here.
